From what I've read, there's a formula used to crudely calculate herd immunity based on r0. 1-1/r0= percentage needed for herd. So say Covid has an r0 of 5 (worst case scenario). 1-1/5= .8, or 80% for herd immunity. Curious where 90% comes from.
